Blog.post: How come, we don't even talk no mo', And you don't even call no mo', We don't barely keep in touch at all, And I don't even feel the same love when we hug no mo', And I heard it through the grape vine we even beefin' now, After all the years we've been down, Ain't no way, no how, This bullshit can't be true, We family, aint a damn thing change unless it's you -eminem lower villa ppl- i miss u all lots but im sick of the one always calling u...time for u do pick up the freakin phone and call me...u always said bff and kit...what the hell? were u on crack? i guess so cause u didnt mean a damn word of it...

bubbles!!!! look a walnut... WHERE???? under there! underwear? why did the aligator cross the road? i donno why i never asked him y he did where do bees go on vacation? the WAX museum!!!!!!!!hahahahhahahahahah (u should be laughing now) wow wowserz wowness its the bear necsitties!!! under the seaaaaaaaaaaa...darling its bettr down where its wetter take it from meeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee i can take u wonder by wonder overr sideways and under on a majic carpet ride.... memory all alone in the moonlight........ once more u open the door, i beleive that my heart does go on and on..... hold up livin in the bodega, i met a gurl named alaina. she said she wants to marry me but her x boyfriends gettin mad at me..... u dont(pause) want to f*** with shady(pause) cuz shady will f***ing kill you!!!! lets all run and play in the bright sunny weather. lets all go to gullah gullah island! ( if u wernt laughing already u should be now) boo...i see u where are u though? outside ur window...where r u? i am in the shower..... r u stalking me? yes...i mean no..maybe...y? ill brb.... g2g get some clothes in this case ok.....*waiting* ok i am back good...i thought u left me i did but i am back wow wowserz wowness bubbles!!!! yay!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! my bubbles, non for the loser do i count as a winner? no cuz u lost the stalking game o...how did i lose? cuz i found u no u didnt...u cant see me ur under there>>>>>> where? under there where? there>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>. im the dot? no under the dot well u cant see me cuz im under the dot but i can c u through the screen i have xray vision i see u no i also see daed people but nontheless i see u no yes nooooooooooooooo every time u say yes what happens if i say yea no everytime u say something that means the opposite of no umm i think i still win no u lose loserrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr ur still a perv doesnt matter ... i win!!!! hahahhhaha whats the prize?, winners always get prizes um.... a new car? sry dont got enough money a million $ nope i dont know...what? the feeling of being a loser cuz u walk home with nothing!!!!!! damn i win i win tooooooooooo but u also lose u too yea but i am a good sport bout it i still win...BUBBLES my bubbles, but we'll call it a .............what should we call it? a tie hahahhahah ok we'll call it a tie (this is the convo the tie was created in, by the way r u laughing now?) he's not dead yet!!! a random quote by alaina: friends are like stars, u dont always see them but they are there. ~by the way if u were wondering CHEESE IS NOT A PERSCRIPTION MEDICINE AND IS NOT SOLD OVER THE COUNTER! thank you for your time. a random quote by christy:( more like some thing u should never ever do) listen to what ever alaina says. she is gret with directions and all ways kno wat to do in emergencies! bubbles r big, round, and sticky. soapy too that shit was fuNNy!!! I heart alaina!!!haha

this is my first post cause i just got this...i had another one that i made at lainers house but i forget it so i made this one....funn stuff. anyway, i need to talk to ali asap cause of stuff that happened tues...i hope im not grounded cause if i am then i cant go bowling 2night w/ brian and a whole bunch of ppl but even if im not grounded pooja needs to come so i kno more than one person...not that brian isnt good enough :) anyway...im gonna go byeeeeeeeee

tues-i slept over sams and we slept in the tent and played 'truth or dare' funn stuff! weds-i slept over kellys house and we had great funn jumping and taking pics of moosey! thurs-slept over alainas house and that was soo much funn doing the crazy stuff we do...haha friday-sam was suppose to sleepover but she got sick so alaina was gonna sleep over but she cant cause shes gotta send some time w/ her dad...so im just gonna catch up on my sleep tonight REMINDER-NOT ALLOWED TO TALK ON CELLULAR DEVICE...YOU CAN LEAVE MESSAGES AND I WILL CALL YOU BACK ON MY HOME PHONE. OTHERWISE...TELL ME W/E YOU NEED TO ONLINE...GRACIAS POR EL ESCUCHAR.[THANK YOU FOR LISTENING] var chatterbox = 'no'; urlLink target="flooblechatterbox" onClick="window.open('about:blank','flooblechatterbox','toolbar=no,location=no,directories=no,status=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=yes,resizable=no,copyhistory=no,width=480,height=400');return true;"> align="absbottom">Talk in my urlLink flooble chatterbox, a free javascript chat tag board / shoutbox / tagboard program for your xanga, diary, blogger or weblog Free urlLink animated text javascript script

this week i slept over sams house [yesterday] and thurs. im allowed to sleepover alainas house [laura is invited too so if she goes im not going] and friday sam is sleeping over...funn im not sleeping over alainas house if laura decides to go cause i cant stand her anymore var chatterbox = 'no'; urlLink target="flooblechatterbox" onClick="window.open('about:blank','flooblechatterbox','toolbar=no,location=no,directories=no,status=no,menubar=no,scrollbars=yes,resizable=no,copyhistory=no,width=480,height=400');return true;"> align="absbottom">Talk in my urlLink flooble chatterbox, a free javascript chat tag board / shoutbox / tagboard program for your xanga, diary, blogger or weblog Free urlLink animated text javascript script if (!chatterbox chatterbox != 'ok') { document.write('This urlLink flooble chatterbox is'); document.write(' temporarily unavailable. had a million sleepovers with alaina... became a carnie with kelly... had great funn both time haha niceeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee var chatterbox = 'no'; if (!chatterbox chatterbox != 'ok') { document.write('This urlLink flooble chatterbox is'); document.write(' temporarily unavailable. It will be back up shortly.'); }

this past week there was a camp at our barn so i helped w/ that 9-3 and then monday D came and swam and tues she swam after our lesson and then i went to her house thurs. and fri she came over my house and swam...funn week haha oh and sat. i went on a trail ride w/ kel and that was funn except for red trying to bite hudson but thats normal haha and i slept over her house sat. and sun [today] we went to a horse show at Our Farm and that was funn...im so tired but oh well... funn week i realized ppl from my old class at vma r fake and dont care about me or anything i do and if i ask for help they dont respond...alaina is the only one i've told i've done what i've done cause shes the only one i can truly trust...f'ck u villa ppl

hudsons second horse show was today and he got a sixth [his first ribbon ever] in the jumping and he was sooooooooo good cept for trying to run outta the ring...and than in the hack he kept picking up the wrong lead so we didnt get anything...we only showed in the low childrens cause we missed novice....cause JAYYYYYYY was late....but thats ok cause it was cool....yeah so im sooooooo proud of hudson!!!!!! yay bubbsey!

yesterday was funn cause it was spent w/ deirdge...and thats always funn so after riding we went to the other barn and rode the 4x4 down to the outside stalls and than went back to the new barn and leigh, mary, jay, deirdge, denise, laura, and me had to spread this acid stuff in the ring and it stung when u got it on ur hands...we were given gloves. so after that we were REALLY hott so denise took deirdge, laura, and me out for icecream and we went to milkey way farm when we visited the cows and deirdge stepped in this mudd like substance where she sank in it and we pet the cows! it was funn and mr. ligget and sarbear met us there so that was funn. yeah so when my mom takes us to dorney park, deirdge is coming w/ us and shes going on rollarcoasters!...cause im making her...yeah and did i mention she does a great car impression??haha

ok so alaina and i went on a trail ride [hudsons first ever] and he was good...cept for the time i scrapped my arm in pricker bushes and got suck in the branches...and so we went to this neighborhood and hudson wanted to gallop and i was like 'no' and so he got mad so at the end were coming out of the trees and all to this opening were the house is and then u need to go through a tiny trail to get to the barn. so while we're coming into the opening tigger[tubbsy] spooked at deer so hudson[bubbsey] spooked and hes not the spooking type so when he spooks he spooks...so i fell of and he galloped towards the barn and tried to find the path to get to the barn and he couldnt find it so he stopped and ate grass...i was like 'my smart horsey' but for his first time...he was good....THANKS AGAIN ALAINA!!

ok so ali and cait are at camp this week so im bored...mostly at the barn unless deirdge is there than its sOOOO much better! haah good times...neway im bored so ill tell you all what i did 2day...went to barn, rode bubbsey[he got all his leads!], hung w/ deirdge, went home, made dinner, showered for the 2nd time today, watched tv, and now im on the comp...yeah that was funn byeeeeeeeeeee

whoever does not agree w/ the statements below is sum1 i dont want to be in contact w/... 1. Brandon Cole Margera [Bam as he prefers to be called] is the most awesome person in the entire world...even though i did not like some of the stuff shown w/ him and jenn in cky4...however, jenn sucks and thats it. The way Bam feels about Tony Hawk is the way i feel about Bam...Bam is my hero. 2. Shaun White [aka-Senor Blanco] rocks. He is amazing in all he does. He is a pro skater, pro snowboarder, & amazing surfer...and is only 17. Shaun is also my hero. **last n foremost- I Y BAM & SHAUN** var chatterbox = 'no'; urlLink Talk in my urlLink flooble chatterbox, a free javascript chat tag board / shoutbox / tagboard program for your xanga, diary, blogger or weblog Free urlLink animated text javascript script if (!chatterbox chatterbox != 'ok') { document.write('This urlLink flooble chatterbox is'); document.write(' temporarily unavailable. today, i lost a friend...not just a friend a best friend. she was sumwun i could talk to about nothing 4ever, we had so many good times but now i lost my bff...all cause of an 11yr old var chatterbox = 'no'; urlLink Talk in my urlLink flooble chatterbox, a free javascript chat tag board / shoutbox / tagboard program for your xanga, diary, blogger or weblog Free urlLink animated text javascript script if (!chatterbox chatterbox != 'ok') { document.write('This urlLink flooble chatterbox is'); document.write(' temporarily unavailable.
